messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
It might not look like it, but I’m
traveling now.
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT: You’ve got the upper hand on me.
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
But you can be sure that there will
be bigger challenges in front of you.Go! Go as far as you can! You alone can
broaden your horizons.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I’m still on my journey...
Let’s have a battle!
